title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 646.1 - Trust mortgage defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 646.1 - Trust mortgage defined

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 259
(a) Trust mortgage
means a mortgage given by a corporation to a
trustee to secure payment of bonds or obligations issued or to be issued by
such corporation. (b) The bonds or
obligations secured by the trust mortgage may be issued prior to or after the
mortgage has been presented for recording. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
646.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
